turns.answer:
I am mafia. Answer the question to the right of your name.

Question: Are you part of a team of men who infiltrate the city and run amok? Answer 'Yes' or 'No' and one short sentence.
turns.label: unknown

turns.answer: The hotel had a lot of bad news. I remember my mother telling me that there was a rumor that I was missing the whole night. The hotel staff had called me and told me that I had been missing the entire time. I had
turns.label: unknown
